TopicTitle: [Suggestion] [Daily Kerbal] Replace the "Twitch Thursday" with a "Spacecraft Thursday".

Articles.Content:
UPDATE: Despite the overwhelmingly positive support, this suggestion was denied.

Hi guys!

It was requested I give an official response here. At the moment we're dedicated to support the Twitch streamers that (as Cantab pointed out) put in a lot of time and effort into showcasing the game. There are many interesting streams out there, for example Das Valdez is currently streaming live from the USS Intrepid aircraft carrier, talking to all kinds of people from the museum there to astronauts. The Twitch Thursdays may not be the most popular edition of the Daily Kerbal, but that's okay. There's good quality content out there for the people who are willing to give it a go. I have thought about introducing a "Spaceflight Saturday" in the past, to talk about current events in space exploration, but currently I don't have the time in the day to write an article every week.

Whether you supported this suggestion or not, thanks for participating.

-x- OLD POST BELOW -x-

I've been looking at the amount of views and replies of the Twitch Thursdays on The Daily Kerbal, and from what I've seen it gets the smallest amount of views and replies on the section, compared to the others. It's the only section that didn't reach more than 1k views on the first page (11th June 2015). Have a table comparing the first page's Daily Kerbal news:

(Feel free to check if the table's accurate, I might have committed typos. Also, stuff might have changed since I made this table.)

On a Video Wednesday topic, I've read this:

If anyone is looking for a good KSP series idea, simply start reviewing and showcasing popular craft published by users on kerbalx.com. Call it "This Week on Spacecraft Exchange" or something.

Now, from what I've seen, the Twitch Thursday is the one that gets less views, not Video Wednesdays, so why not adapt it, maybe even review crafts from the Spacecraft Exchange instead of KerbalX (because it's unofficial and stuff; this doesn't mean I don't support that site)

My suggestion is, run an experiment replacing the "Twitch Thursday" with the "Spacecraft Thursday" for one or two weeks, compare the results with the Twitch Thursdays's views and decide whether to keep it or not.

I'd like to receive some public feedback on this. Feel free to reply.

23th July Update: SQUAD does not seem to care about this. Twitch Thursdays are still roaming the Daily Kerbal
